text: Alex Rocco (born Alexander Federico Petricone; (February 29, 1936 â€“ July 18, 2015) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as Moe Greene in The Godfather. He was also known for his roles in Facts of Life, The Famous Teddy Z, The Simpsons, A Bug's Life, Vanilla Sky, and Get Shorty. He won an Emmy Award in 1990. ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Cambridge, Massachusetts
title: Alex Rocco
